headline: Brown & Brown launches fully integrated National Healthcare Practice
summary: An integrated national practice delivering comprehensive healthcare risk, insurance and brokerage solutionsDAYTONA BEACH, Fla., Jan. 22, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Brown & Brown, Inc. (NYSE: BRO) (“the Company”) today announced the launch of a fully integrated, all-lines National Healthcare Practice — Brown & Brown Healthcare. This major step brings together more than 140 seasoned professionals into a specialized team dedicated to delivering comprehensive, innovative risk solutions for the full sp
